entries.TITLE: Subscription
entries.CONTENT:
The developers of Morpheus TV offers a premium version available to those that pay. Website : https://tinyurl.com/4pb7euun

Email us morpheustv0@gmail.com to pay. 35$ lifetime and nothing more, no taxes or fees! We may give you a test run depending on the email statements.

entries.TITLE: DMCA
entries.CONTENT:
We the developers of Morpheus TV don't host any of the movies or files on the links presented inside the app. Morpheus TV just indexes the publicly available data on the internet. If you have a copyright claim, then it is your responsibility to remove the content from the respected places (which is found on the internet). Nothing in this app is available from us. Morpheus TV is basically google search. Searches a movie on the internet and find a link which the user can play. This app is completely legal to use because it acts as a google search.

Users may need vpn when using application. Your isp may be blocking the website connection, that Morpheus TV uses to scrape.

entries.TITLE: Debrid Cloud
entries.CONTENT:
Found no links? No worries Debrid Cloud is an awesome feature inside the app for Real-Debrid users. Watch all your torrents from Real-Debrid cloud.

1st find a magnet which will contain the movie or episode which can be found on an external 3rd party app. Paste the magnet in Real-Debrid site, then come back to Morpheus TV and watch whatever you want!

entries.TITLE: Disclaimer
entries.CONTENT:
The author does not host or upload any of the content of the app. 

All content is retrieved from third-party websites like Trakt.tv, TMDB, Imdb,Openload, Streamango, Google, TheVideo, Vidup, Vidoza, etc..

The author does not have any affiliation with the content providers and is not responsible for the content they provide.

To know more about the app, check the "Information" section on the main menu.

entries.TITLE: Real-Debrid
entries.CONTENT:
You can integrate Real-Debrid with Morpheus TV. 
Morpheus TV only uses hosters for users to stream

You may use a vpn with Real-Debrid, but it has to be verified by Real-Debrid themselves.

Real-Debrid integration for now is limited to just a few hosters like Clipwatching, Vidlox, Vidoza, and a few more.

After selecting a RD source, some metadata will be unrestricted which includes the first and last pieces of the video file and this process can take a few seconds or minutes depending on the speed of your connection. Morpheus TV will always check RD files first before unrestricted it automatically. This will help not bombarding RD servers.

entries.TITLE: All-Debrid
entries.CONTENT:
You can integrate All-Debrid with Morpheus TV. 
Morpheus TV only uses hosters for users to stream

You may use a vpn with AD, but it has to be verified by AD themselves.

AD integration for now is limited to just a few hosters like Clipwatching, Vidlox, Vidoza, and a few more.

After selecting a AD source, some metadata will be unrestricted which includes the first and last pieces of the video file and this process can take a few seconds or minutes depending on the speed of your connection.

entries.TITLE: Genres
entries.CONTENT:
Morpheus TV integrates with TMDB and allows you to choose different genres.

After clicking any genre, the app will make a few connections, then load up your genre choice.

In the future there will be custom genres created by the developer of Morpheus TV.

entries.TITLE: About
entries.CONTENT:
MorpheusTV is a free app without any ads or subscription plans.
It searches several free and public websites for streaming links and displays the results in simple interface navigateable with a DPAD remote control without the need for a mouse or keyboard.

All movie and tvshow metadata is retrieved from TMDB, posters and backdrops are retrieved from TMDB also.
All links scraped by the app are available to the public in their respective websites and are hosted by third-party services like Clipwatching, Vidlox, Google, Aparat, Upstream, Vidoza, etc..

It has some integration with your Trakt.tv account but for now it is limited to Collections and Watchlist.

It uses its own internal player (Exoplayer with some modifications)
In the first versions it used external players like VLC and MxPlayer but they were quickly dismissed because of the lack of control over the UI and the HTTP request headers.
There may or may not be ads, the future will decide that.

Morpheus TV is not meant to be a competitor to any other app like some youtubers are claiming.
I actually do not care what other app have as in features. This is the first and best app i have ever made. No need to copy other app's features. This is what makes my unique!
After OG Morpheus TV died, i thought to myself, that i can make an app just like it. After many months of making this app. It's now perfect. I made this app for myself.

entries.TITLE: Support
entries.CONTENT: We are still debating on a support page. Come back here soon:)
